repairedDockerfile:
# DOCKER-VERSION 1.2.0
#
# Ceph base image
#
# VERSION 1.0.0


FROM stackbrew/ubuntu:trusty
MAINTAINER Se√°n C McCord "ulexus@gmail.com"

# Make sure we are up-to-date
RUN apt-get update && apt-get install --no-install-recommends -y ceph && rm -rf /var/lib/apt/lists/*;
RUN apt-get upgrade -y

# Install ceph
